StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Identifying Novel Small RNA Biomarkers Unique to Patients with Gastric Cancer

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA LOS ANGELESRNAMETRIX, INC.

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: We thank Tania Lombo of the NIH Common Fund for her assistance and guidance. We also wish to acknowledge the Public Health Service (PHS) grants from the National Institutes of Health/National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research (NIH/NIDCR) [UH3 TR000923 and T90 DE022734] as well as the 2017 Debbie’s Dream Foundation – American Association for Cancer Research (AACR) Gastric Cancer Research Fellowship (Grant Number 17-40-41-KACZ). In addition, we highly acknowledge the donation made by Ronnie James Dio Stand Up and Shout Cancer Fund.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB, PUB, NPU)
